name: ototakibim-mvp
description: OtoTakibim - AI Destekli Araç Sağlık Asistanı

scripts.dev:safe: npm run kill-ports && npm run dev
scripts.dev:clean: npm run kill-ports && npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean:all: npm run kill-ports && rm -rf backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/.next
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.health: curl http://localhost:5000/health || curl http://localhost:5001/health || curl http://localhost:5002/health || curl http://localhost:5003/health

author: OtoTakibim Team
